post.author: 임기순
post.content:
Hi Joshua,
My name is Arjun Asoka, an IT recruiter with TEKsystems in Toronto. I hope things are going well on your end. I wanted to reach out to you for some assistance on an opportunity I am currently recruiting on. I have attached the details of the position for your review. I believe that good IT people know other good IT people, so if you do know someone who would be interested or even someone I could network with, I would greatly appreciate it. Thanks for your time
Our client in the insurance industry is currently in need of a J2EE Designer for a 6 month contract to work on a major Business Intelligence initiative. This initiative is to develop data services that will interface with the Operational Data Store.
Responsibilities:
-Take a lead role in the design of complex applications
-Develops solutions consistent with the target architecture and standards, that are of high quality, cost effective and that produce the desired results
- Understands the options for implementing service oriented architecture and operational data environment - Provides input to decisions on realization of services
- Performs all levels of testing, including unit, integration, regression, system, and user acceptance testing to ensure that applications will perform error free and according to business specifications
-Provides guidance and support for the resolution of complex production problems
-Identifies opportunities to ensure high quality in all deliverables and continuous improvement in application development
Requirements:
-Seven years of progressive experience in information services
-At least 5 years of experience in J2EE programming
-At least 5 years of SOA experience
-Previous experience in Project Development using a system development lifecycle methodology
-Strong technical skills and ability in a Java/J2EE environment
-Excellent analytical, problem solving and decision making skills
-Ability to organize and plan tasks effectively
-Fluent in application development within the J2EE environment (i.e. JMS, EJB, RAD, Hibernate, Spring, web services, JSP, etc.), with DataStage or mainframe knowledge an asset
-In depth knowledge of an Information Services environment (e.g., Websphere, Java, Oracle)
-Previous experience from P&C Insurance Industry background in required

Arjun Asokakumar TECHNICAL RECRUITER 150 YORK STREET, SUITE 1206
TORONTO, ONTARIO M5H 3S5 877.342.5004 T 416.342.5004 F 416.342.5070
post.title: J2ee designer (SOA and Insurance experience) - CONTRACT
